Field.Name: RIF_PROFILE
Field.OneLineDescription: RIF profile is the VSI profile

Field.Name: RESULT_TYPE
Field.OneLineDescription: Special field that used for identification between multiple results types in table

Field.Name: CORE_ID
Field.OneLineDescription: Device Core-ID, special field used for access according to core mode

Field.Name: IPV4
Field.OneLineDescription: An Internet Protocol address (IP address) v4

Field.Name: IPV4_SIP
Field.OneLineDescription: An Internet Protocol address (IP address) v4, source address

Field.Name: IPV4_DIP
Field.OneLineDescription: An Internet Protocol address (IP address) v4, destination address

Field.Name: IPV4_GROUP
Field.OneLineDescription: An Internet Protocol address (IP address) v4, Multi-Cast Group

Field.Name: IPV6
Field.OneLineDescription: An Internet Protocol address (IP address) v6

Field.Name: IPV6_SIP
Field.OneLineDescription: An Internet Protocol address (IP address) v6, source address

Field.Name: IPV6_DIP
Field.OneLineDescription: An Internet Protocol address (IP address) v6, destination address

Field.Name: KAPS_RESULT
Field.OneLineDescription: Payloads types supported by the KAPS.

Field.Name: FEC_DEFAULT
Field.OneLineDescription: FEC that can be used for default entries

Field.Name: MC_ID_KAPS
Field.OneLineDescription: The MC ID supported by the KAPS (only 17b)

Field.Name: VLAN_ID
Field.OneLineDescription: VLAN tagging Identifier in the packet Ethernet header

Field.Name: VLAN_MEMBER_DOMAIN_BMP
Field.OneLineDescription: Bitmap of VLAN member domain. Each bit represent the VLAN member domain ID. VLAN member domain is a group that mapped from the PP port or logical port (for example PWE). Used as part of the VLAN membership table

Field.Name: PP_PORT
Field.OneLineDescription: Internal PP port mapped from Logical port

Field.Name: VLAN_DOMAIN
Field.OneLineDescription: Group of PP ports that share the same semantic space of VLAN tags

Field.Name: PORT_VID
Field.OneLineDescription: Port default VID (VLAN-ID) also called PVID

Field.Name: STG_ID
Field.OneLineDescription: Spanning Tree group, also known as Topology ID

Field.Name: STP_STATE
Field.OneLineDescription: Spanning Tree protocol state, can be block, learn and forward

Field.Name: DEFAULT_AC_PROF
Field.OneLineDescription: Default AC profile, used in case of no match of AC

Field.Name: ESEM_ACCESS_CMD
Field.OneLineDescription: Per port ESEM access command, mapped to access properties like default lookup result

Field.Name: TX_OUTER_TAG_VALID
Field.OneLineDescription: Enable, Disable to remove TAG on TX packet Outer-VID

Field.Name: TX_OUTER_TAG_VID
Field.OneLineDescription: Outer VID to use when removing TAG on TX packet

Field.Name: VLAN_MEMBERSHIP_IF
Field.OneLineDescription: Vlan membership interface used as port (logical and physical) attribute for VLAN membership tables

EnumVal.Name: DEFAULT
EnumVal.Description: default value of field

EnumVal.Name: DROP
EnumVal.Description: drop action description

EnumVal.Name: SNOOP
EnumVal.Description: snoop action description

EnumVal.Name: REDIRECT
EnumVal.Description: redirect action description

Field.Name: SAME_INTERFACE_FILTER_BY_INLIF_PROFILE
Field.OneLineDescription: Mapping from inlif profile to same intf filter

Field.Name: SYS_PORT_EQUAL
Field.OneLineDescription: Are source and destination sys ports equal

Field.Name: SAME_INTERFACE_FILTER_BY_OUTLIF_PROFILE
Field.OneLineDescription: Mapping from outlif profile to same intf filter

Field.Name: SAME_INTERFACE_FILTER_BY_FWD_CONTEXT
Field.OneLineDescription: Mapping from forwarding context to same intf filter

Field.Name: TPID_INDEX
Field.OneLineDescription: The index to access the TPID table

Field.Name: TPID_VALUE
Field.OneLineDescription: The TPID value in the TPID table

EnumVal.Name: SNOOP
EnumVal.Description: snoop action

EnumVal.Name: MIRROR
EnumVal.Description: mirror action

EnumVal.Name: STATISTICAL_SAMPLE
EnumVal.Description: statistical sampling action

Field.Name: SNIF_STRENGTH
Field.OneLineDescription: Controls which packet to drop in case of original/SNIFed packet drop

EnumVal.Name: ENABLE_COPY_ON_REJECT
EnumVal.Description: Default - Snoop and Forward are orthogonal

EnumVal.Name: DISABLE_SNIF_ON_FWD_REJECT
EnumVal.Description: Disable Snoop on Forward Reject

EnumVal.Name: DISABLE_FWD_ON_SNIF_REJECT
EnumVal.Description: Disable Forward on Snoop Reject

Field.Name: LAG_LB_KEY_OW
Field.OneLineDescription: LAG LB key(trunk hash) for the copy overwrite

Field.Name: LAG_LB_KEY
Field.OneLineDescription: LAG LB key(trunk hash) for the copy

Field.Name: TC_OW
Field.OneLineDescription: Traffic class for the copy overwrite

Field.Name: CROP_ENABLE
Field.OneLineDescription: If set, only first 256B are used for the copy, otherwise all the packet is replicated

Field.Name: REMOVE_SYSTEM_HEADERS_ENABLE
Field.OneLineDescription: If set then original system headers are removed from the packet

Field.Name: EXT_STAT_DATA_VALID
Field.OneLineDescription: If set, external statistics is valid

Field.Name: INT_STAT_OBJ_VALID_OW
Field.OneLineDescription: Internal statistics object is valid overwrite

Field.Name: SNIF_PROBABILITY
Field.OneLineDescription: Probability of SNIF execution, calculated as (2^24-SnpActSnpSamplingProbability)/2^24

Field.Name: LLVP_PROFILE
Field.OneLineDescription: LLVP PROFILE, part of LLVP table key

Field.Name: IS_OUTER_PRIO
Field.OneLineDescription: OUTER TAG IS PRIORITY, part of LLVP table key

Field.Name: OUTER_TPID
Field.OneLineDescription: OUTER TPID INDEX, part of LLVP table key

Field.Name: INNER_TPID
Field.OneLineDescription: INNER TPID INDEX, part of LLVP table key

Field.Name: INCOMING_VID_EXIST
Field.OneLineDescription: Incoming packet has a VLAN tag that is not a priority tag

Field.Name: INCOMING_TAG_EXIST
Field.OneLineDescription: Incoming packet has a VLAN tag

Field.Name: LLVP_INCOMING_TAG_STRUCTURE
Field.OneLineDescription: Used to generate VLAN edit command

Field.Name: IVEC_INDEX
Field.OneLineDescription: Index to the ingress VLAN edit command table

Field.Name: DEFAULT_LIF
Field.OneLineDescription: Default Lif. Default AC lif per incoming port

Field.Name: MY_MAC_BASED_MC_BACKBONE_ENABLE
Field.OneLineDescription: Enable the MyMac based MC backbone.

Field.Name: MY_MAC_BASED_UC_BACKBONE_ENABLE
Field.OneLineDescription: Enable the MyMac based UC backbone.

Field.Name: VLAN_EDIT_COMMAND_INDEX
Field.OneLineDescription: Index to a VLAN Edit commands table - IVEC or EVEC

Field.Name: OUTER_TPID_INDEX
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for TPID value for a VLAN Edit added Outer tag

Field.Name: INNER_TPID_INDEX
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for TPID value for a VLAN Edit added Inner tag

Field.Name: IVE_OUTER_VID_SRC
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for VID value for an IVE VLAN Edit added Outer tag

EnumVal.Name: EMPTY
EnumVal.Description: No VLAN Edit action for the tag

EnumVal.Name: AC_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the AC LIF Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: AC_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the AC LIF Inner VID

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Incoming packet Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Incoming packet Inner VID

Field.Name: IVE_INNER_VID_SRC
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for VID value for an IVE VLAN Edit added Inner tag

EnumVal.Name: EMPTY
EnumVal.Description: No VLAN Edit action for the tag

EnumVal.Name: AC_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the AC LIF Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: AC_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the AC LIF Inner VID

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Incoming packet Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Incoming packet Inner VID

Field.Name: IVE_OUTER_PCP_DEI_SRC
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for PCP-DEI value for an IVE VLAN Edit added Outer tag

EnumVal.Name: EMPTY
EnumVal.Description: No VLAN Edit action for the tag

EnumVal.Name: AC_OUTER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP-DEI Source is the AC LIF Outer PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: AC_INNER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the AC LIF Inner PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_OUTER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the Incoming packet Outer PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_INNER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the Incoming packet Inner PCP-DEI mapping

Field.Name: IVE_INNER_PCP_DEI_SRC
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for PCP-DEI value for an IVE VLAN Edit added Inner tag

EnumVal.Name: EMPTY
EnumVal.Description: No VLAN Edit action for the tag

EnumVal.Name: AC_OUTER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP-DEI Source is the AC LIF Outer PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: AC_INNER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the AC LIF Inner PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_OUTER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the Incoming packet Outer PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_INNER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the Incoming packet Inner PCP-DEI mapping

Field.Name: TAGS_TO_REMOVE
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for PCP-DEI value for a VLAN Edit added Inner tag

Field.Name: EVE_OUTER_VID_SRC
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for VID value for an EVE VLAN Edit added Outer tag

EnumVal.Name: EMPTY
EnumVal.Description: No VLAN Edit action for the tag

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Incoming packet Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Incoming packet Inner VID

EnumVal.Name: AC_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the AC LIF Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: AC_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the AC LIF Inner VID

EnumVal.Name: FORWARD_DOMAIN
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Forward domain (VSI)

EnumVal.Name: ARP_AC_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the ARP+AC LIF Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: ARP_AC_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the ARP+AC LIF Inner VID

Field.Name: EVE_INNER_VID_SRC
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for VID value for an EVE VLAN Edit added Inner tag

EnumVal.Name: EMPTY
EnumVal.Description: No VLAN Edit action for the tag

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Incoming packet Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Incoming packet Inner VID

EnumVal.Name: AC_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the AC LIF Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: AC_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the AC LIF Inner VID

EnumVal.Name: FORWARD_DOMAIN
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the Forward domain (VSI)

EnumVal.Name: ARP_AC_OUTER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the ARP+AC LIF Outer VID

EnumVal.Name: ARP_AC_INNER_VID
EnumVal.Description: VID Source is the ARP+AC LIF Inner VID

Field.Name: EVE_OUTER_PCP_DEI_SRC
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for PCP-DEI value for an EVE VLAN Edit added Outer tag

EnumVal.Name: AC_INNER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the AC LIF Inner PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: AC_OUTER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP-DEI Source is the AC LIF Outer PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_INNER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the Incoming packet Inner PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_OUTER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the Incoming packet Outer PCP-DEI mapping

Field.Name: EVE_INNER_PCP_DEI_SRC
Field.OneLineDescription: Source for PCP-DEI value for an EVE VLAN Edit added Inner tag

EnumVal.Name: AC_INNER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the AC LIF Inner PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: AC_OUTER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP-DEI Source is the AC LIF Outer PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_INNER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the Incoming packet Inner PCP-DEI mapping

EnumVal.Name: INCOMING_OUTER_PCP_DEI
EnumVal.Description: PCP_DEI Source is the Incoming packet Outer PCP-DEI mapping

Field.Name: LOGICAL_GPORT
Field.OneLineDescription: All logical gports - VLAN PORT, MPLS PORT, EXTENDER, L2GRE, MIM, VXLAN

EnumVal.Name: IN_LIF_ID
EnumVal.Description: payload contain only in-lif ID

EnumVal.Name: VTEP_IDX
EnumVal.Description: payload contain only VTEP index

EnumVal.Name: IN_LIF_ID_OR_VTEP_IDX
EnumVal.Description: payload contain in-lif ID or VTEP index

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_COUNTER_FORMAT
Field.OneLineDescription: counter format. what it count, the frmat and the arithmetic operation it does

EnumVal.Name: NOT_VALID_MODE
EnumVal.Description: value not valid. made just to align dbal rules

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_BYTES_WIDE
EnumVal.Description: one wide incrementation counter for byte

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_BYTES_NARROW
EnumVal.Description: 2 narrow incrementation counters for byte

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_PACKETS_AND_BYTES
EnumVal.Description: 2 narrow incrematation counters, one for packets and one for bytes

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_PACKETS_WIDE
EnumVal.Description: one wide incrementation counter for packets

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_PACKETS_NARROW
EnumVal.Description: 2 narrow incrementation counters for packets

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_MAX_WIDE
EnumVal.Description: one wide counter that holds the max value

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_MAX_NARROW
EnumVal.Description: 2 narrow counters that holds the max value

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_AVERAGE_WIDE
EnumVal.Description: one wide average counter

EnumVal.Name: COUNTER_AVERAGE_NARROW
EnumVal.Description: 2 narrow avergae counters

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_ENABLE_CLEAR_ON_READ
Field.OneLineDescription: after read a counter, reset to value 0 or 1

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_PIPE_ENABLE
Field.OneLineDescription: Enable CRPS ALU (access to CRPS memories)

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_N_SCAN_WAIT_TIME_BETWEEN_ALG_SCANS
Field.OneLineDescription: Algorithm and sequential sampling intervals. Clock resolution

EnumVal.Name: NO_SCAN
EnumVal.Description: no scan

EnumVal.Name: SEQUENTIAL_SCAN
EnumVal.Description: sequential scan only

EnumVal.Name: ALGORITHIM_SCAN
EnumVal.Description: algorithim scan only

EnumVal.Name: SEQUENTIAL_AND_ALGORITHIM_SCAN
EnumVal.Description: sequential and algorithim scan

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SCAN_THRESHOLD
Field.OneLineDescription: last 8 bits of scanner threshold for sending to dma

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SCAN_PKT_THRESHOLD
Field.OneLineDescription: last 4 bits of scanner pkt threshold for sending to dma. relevant just for pkts and bytes format

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SCAN_OBJECT_TYPE_FOR_DMA
Field.OneLineDescription: Add additional event-ID to DMA record, per engine

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SCAN_DMA_RECORD_LOGICAL_SEL
Field.OneLineDescription: select if the record for DMA FIFO is physical or logical. (record time is in another field)

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SCAN_CLEAR_ON_READ_ENABLE
Field.OneLineDescription: enable "clear after read" on the counter

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SOURCE_SELECT
Field.OneLineDescription: the source and interface id that connected to the engine

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_PTR_BASE_NORMALIZE
Field.OneLineDescription: offset to reduce from the stat-object-id

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_ADDRESS_BASE_NORMALIZE
Field.OneLineDescription: define the first stat index of the engine.

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_INIT_REQUEST
Field.OneLineDescription: init counters memory per engine and all other memories belong the engine

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SCAN_ENABLE
Field.OneLineDescription: enable-disable all scan together per engine (but not memory init)

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SOURCE_SELECT_ENABLE
Field.OneLineDescription: enable the interface mux or disable. Untill enable, no data will be enter to CRPS

Field.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_DMA_SELECT
Field.OneLineDescription: select which engine to use (0 or 1)

Field.Name: CRPS_ITM_PKTSIZE_NOT_QSIZE_SEL
Field.OneLineDescription: select if CRPS refer to TM packets size or Q size

Field.Name: CRPS_ITPP_LTNCY_CTR_EXPANSION_SELECT
Field.OneLineDescription: 16 bits expansion select mux for ITPP

Field.Name: CRPS_ERPP_CTR_EXPANSION_SELECT
Field.OneLineDescription: 16 bits expansion select mux for ERPP

Field.Name: CRPS_ETPP_CTR_EXPANSION_SELECT
Field.OneLineDescription: 24 bits expansion select mux for ETPP

Field.Name: CRPS_IRPP_CTR_EXPANSION_SELECT
Field.OneLineDescription: 36 bits expansion select mux for IRPP

Field.Name: CRPS_IRPP_PACKET_SIZE_SELECT
Field.OneLineDescription: select if to use compensation schem 0 or 1

Field.Name: CRPS_ETPP_LTNCY_CTR_SELECT
Field.OneLineDescription: select if to use ETPP IF5 for latency or for packet size

Field.Name: CRPS_EXPANSION_DATA_ADMISSION
Field.OneLineDescription: addmission for a given expansion value

Field.Name: CRPS_EXPANSION_DATA_OFFSET
Field.OneLineDescription: offset in the counter_set for a given expansion value

Field.Name: CRPS_EXPANSION_INDEX
Field.OneLineDescription: index for the expansion data mapping table
